                        AI can be beneficial in predicting outcomes but it can also take away the
                    

                                        







                
                
                    
                        
                                                                                                                                        Ai can be beneficial in predicting outcomes but it
                                                                                                                        
                                                                    


                    
    
                                
                    School
                    
                                                    
                                Wayne State University
                            
                                            
            

        
                                
                Course Title
                
                                            
                            ENG 1020
                        
                                    
            

        
                    
                Type
                Essay

            

        
                                    
                    
                        
                            Uploaded By
                            
                                sbondada2
                            
                        

                    

                

                            
                    
                Pages
                10
            

                
                
        
                
                           


                    
                                                    
                                
                                    
                                    
                                                                                                                                    This preview shows page 7 - 9 out of 10 pages.
                                                                                                                        
                                

                            

                        
                        
                                                            

                                                    

                                            

                    
                                                
                                                    

                                                
                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                
                                                                                                    privacy of an individual. It has the capability to manipulate an audience based on their personality and weak points. AI is creating an unstoppable future but it also creating of a future of no security. American will have to get used to the fact the AI will always be in their lives but to what extent should be defined. Although it is a difficult and demanding task, the government should set laws and regulation for companies and candidates as to how AI can be used. One regulation that is vital is to expose AI. Many Americans are currently unaware of the effect of artificial intelligence and how it is being used against them. By revealing to the audience that artificial intelligence is being used on them, it gives individuals a warning so they are not as upset about being manipulated. AI is creating a new way of government. AI can be used for a lot of things such as menial public sector jobs and especially influencing elections. Making regulation is important and Americans are going to get used to it. The future of AI awaits and we have yet to see how AI will be used in campaigning for the next big 2020 Presidential election. Word Count: 2,504

Taddeo, Mariarosaria, and Luciano Floridi. "How AI can be a force for good: An ethical " framework will help to harness the potential of AI while keeping humans in control. Science, vol. 361, no. 6404, 2018, p. 751+. Opposing Viewpoints in Context, d=80a6418e. Accessed 19 Nov. 2018. Macklin, Ruth. "The New Conservatives in Bioethics: Who Are They and What Do They Seek?"
